page.title: 12Industry in Wootton Bassett
page.content: {The St.Ivel Creamery} This is the largest factory in Wootton Bassett. The dairy has been in Wootton Bassett since 1913. Recent investment of Â£25 million has expanded the factory and doubled employment to 520 people producng yogurt(250,000 pots per day),cottage cheese,cream,desserts and bottled milk. Farmers in a 20 mile radius send a total of 100,000 gallons of milk daily to be processed. This involves tankers visiting about 350 farms. Dairy products are distributed by road and Wootton Bassett's nearness to the M4 & M5 motorways is one reason why St.Ivel have expanded in the town. Ten years ago almost all the workforce lived in Wootton Bassett but now about half commute from the Swindon area. Most of the workers are female. The factory has a shift system and works 24 hours a day and 7 days a week.
